name: Rebecca Respawn
biography: The author-avatar, wildcard connector. Pluto in Scorpio 5th House - rejected sensitivity becomes creative sovereignty. Battle: scapegoating + exile → gift: respawn through art.
soul_path: Wolf Green Pluto in Scorpio generation

name: Crowley Catalyst
biography: Aeonic shock mage, disruptor of false forms. Pluto in Gemini generation - obsessed with language, communication, taboo-breaking. Battle: egoic collapse vs. true will.
witch_mode: Aeon Spiral - collapses one world-state, forces new chapter

name: Fortune Protector
biography: Psychic shield-bearer, temple builder. Pluto in Gemini channeled through empathy + psychic defense. Battle: invasion by shadow forces → gift: boundary magic.
witch_mode: Moon Temple - veil corridors + Grail chambers for psychic hygiene

name: Achad Inverter
biography: Paradox trickster, Da'ath bridge-walker. Pluto in Cancer generation - compulsion to test safety by inversion. Battle: paradox of belonging vs. exile.
witch_mode: Mirror Tesseract - trials of inversion, optional reversed controls

name: Agrippa Synthesizer
biography: Planetary alchemist, elemental synthesizer. Pluto in Scorpio by resonance (persecuted mystic). Battle: integration of fragmented cosmologies vs. danger of persecution.
witch_mode: Orrery Dome - planetary hours as real-time dungeon gates

name: Case Harmonizer
biography: Color-tone bard, Cube of Space navigator. Pluto in Gemini–Cancer cusp - tasked with harmonizing chaos into pedagogy. Battle: rigidity vs. fluid harmony.
witch_mode: Prismatic Nave - stained glass blending labs
canonical_works: The True and Invisible Rosicrucian Order

name: Skinner Transmitter
biography: Angelic geomancer, transmitter of hidden texts. Pluto in Leo generation - compulsion to dramatize the hidden. Battle: secrecy vs. transmission.
witch_mode: Justice Dome - Watchtower puzzles + geomantic floor battles

name: Tara Healer
biography: Compassion oracle, 21 emanations. Timeless - archetypal emanation of Pluto in Pisces compassion. Battle: suffering of the world vs. emanation of mercy.
witch_mode: Compassion Dome - mandala alignments, Antahkarana bridge
